Summary: they were yellow orange lights that stayed in place
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home from the Super Bowl party when out the window, me and my family saw 5 or 6 yellow orange lights in the sky. I don't know how long they were there, but they were stationary. I didn't know what the were, my mom thought they were just hot air balloons, but like I said, they were stationary. I lost sight of it because we drove away .
